page.title: 13MODERN LIFE IN SADDLEWORTH
page.content: Old cottages are 'in vogue' in today's society. Many people are moving into properties in rural areas, restoring or renovating old cottages to make them into valuable 'desirable' homes, rather than spoiling the character of such places as Saddleworth with new houses. They tend to commute daily to Manchester, & thus do not contribute to everyday life in the area. Local residents who were born & bred in Diggle regret this in general because the village is being used simply as a place to sleep. Even local trade suffers as these commuters do not shop loacally, but tend to shop at their place of work. The effect of this is that local young people are tending to move away from the villages, mainly to get employment, as there is no hope of local work now mills are closed down, & little entertainment for them here.
